summary: The module implements concrete Matplotlib linear-section style classes derived from an abstract base, each configuring data preparation and visual appearance for specific meteorological variables (default, horizontal velocity, relative humidity, vertical velocity) to be used in the MSS web mapping service.
business_intent: Supply ready‑to‑use, consistent visual styling for linear plots of atmospheric data, enabling the MSS platform to generate clear, standardized visualizations of key weather parameters in its web map service.
